content: I followed the Ubuntu direct install (non-vagrant) development server instructions. I would like my server to listen on it's public IP and/or domain name. Where would I configure this? Should I just setup an NGINX proxy to pass things from outside to 127.0.0.1:9991? It appears to me, that the settings like EXTERNAL_HOST in the settings.py file are only for production use. Correct?
@Colt McCormack You just need to pass --interface='' to tools/run-dev.py
